text: Richard A. "Rick" Baker (born December 8, 1950) is an American special makeup effects artist known for his creature effect makeup. He has won seven Academy Awards. Baker was born in Binghamton, New York on December 8, 1950.Rick Baker Biography (1950) He studied at the Academy of Art University. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Academy Award winning make-up artists Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Make-up artists Category:People from Binghamton, New York
title: Rick Baker
